name: Undying Commitment
description:
“You are my knight, and this sword is the proof of your oath. I expect you to follow me until the day I die.”

Kinetic Twine game made for Duo Jam 2022! (Which I finished very late. Oops.)

A faithful knight thinks back on what makes them so willing to die live for their princess. 

Basically a mizuena (Project Sekai) fanfic in the form of an interactive fiction. Prsk knowledge is not required to understand this story but certainly helps with the little details.

You can read the non-kinetic version here. Hope you enjoy <3
